* Carnage snarled and grit her teeth as she saw and heard Cyber Claw skid on 
the floor, she shielded her eyes from the light with her front limbs as the 
sparks flew.
She heard a bump on the base floor and looked to see what had caused it, she 
smiled and walked over to the reptile on it's chest.
She lowered her head to to about Cyber Claw's height and almost couldn't 
contain her laughter...*

" Have a nice trip? And I'll see you next fall."

* Then Carnage raised her head and scanned, this ship was new!
Suddenly she knew for a fact what ship this was...the ARK! She gasped in 
wonder as she looked around at the massive ship, she smiled and took a few 
steps inside.
Carnage looked around and almost seemed to feel right at home.
With a sigh she stepped back towards Cyber Claw and tapped her on the back 
with the end of her tail.*

" Do you know what ship this is? It's the...Ark! The Autobot ship of the 
Maximal's ancestors. Amazing!"

* With that she then looked down at Cyber Claw and shook her head, what a 
silly sight the clone made...to her anyway.
She sighed again and scanned the ship, she located the CR chamber rooms and 
then began to head off in that direction, since they were here they might as 
well repair like that one bot said.*
